text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The USA accounts for only 4.2% of the world population. We account for 19.5% (about 1/5!) of global coronavirus deaths, and 38.3% of active global cases. We have 23,068 deaths (1st place, yo) compared to 217 in S. Korea. (We both had our first cases on Jan. 20.) #MAGA #KAG
